title: FPS
body: I haven't played League in a while and when i came back i dropped from my usual 17-25 FPS to 2 FPS and now I can't even play the game. Is there any way I can improve my FPS?

replies.body: its been playing up for 2 weeks now you to sit at 60 fps no drops nothing. last 2 weeks it goes from 30 to 8 to 5 and jumps makes it impossible to play what is the problem HELLLLPPPP

Hey  themankillerpig,

Please make sure to pay attention to the date on the thread and comments to avoid necroing it. You're not in trouble but I will be disabling further commenting on this thread. If you would like to bring your topic to attention, please feel free to create a new discussion about it to give it visibility!

I happened to check something silly on my laptop the other day after having the same issue, low FPS when a lot of things were on the screen at once (mainly team fights or aram), like 08 FPS.... frustrating, and obviously can't play like that. I have Windows on a Lenovo cpu, and there is the main app that comes with the original software called "Energy Manager." Somehow, my setting got changed to 'green mode' (to save power or something stupid like that) - anyways, I switched it to 'high performance mode': Holy Smokes!!! Even the champ select screen moves lightning quick, compared to the laggy, choppy switching of the back and forth ban & pick. Whereas before, I had to keep all settings at low quality/high performace, and still barely got to +25 FPS; now I'm running at all high quality and can manage to clock an average of 80-90+ FPS, sometimes as high as 130-150 FPS I've seen at times. 

Check this simple setting out first. Saved me a lot of grief :D 

~Spence "SuSpence"

Low FPS can be caused by a number of different factors, though the most common causes are problematic drivers or windows power settings. I recommend checking out the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if you continue to see low FPS after working through those steps.
I did everything and it has gotten me to 4 FPS. I still can't play in these conditions :o

There may be issues with your hardware or something we haven't considered yet. I recommend running a set of system logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can work with you further.

Let me know if you have any questions.
